description: Creates a new Neptune Analytics graph.

parameters.name: graphName
parameters.description: A name for the new Neptune Analytics graph to be created. The name must contain from 1 to 63 letters, numbers, or hyphens, and its first character must be a letter. It cannot end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens. Only lowercase letters are allowed.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Adds metadata tags to the new graph. These tags can also be used with cost allocation reporting, or used in a Condition statement in an IAM policy. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: vectorSearchConfiguration
parameters.description: Specifies the number of dimensions for vector embeddings that will be loaded into the graph. The value is specified as ``dimension=``value. Max = 65,535 The number of dimensions.

parameters.name: replicaCount
parameters.description: The number of replicas in other AZs. Min =0, Max = 2, Default = 1.

parameters.name: provisionedMemory
parameters.description: The provisioned memory-optimized Neptune Capacity Units (m-NCUs) to use for the graph. Min = 16

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The graph name. For example: my-graph-1.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the graph.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason the status was given.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time when the graph was created.

nested_items.name: provisionedMemory
nested_items.description: The provisioned memory-optimized Neptune Capacity Units (m-NCUs) to use for the graph.

nested_items.name: publicConnectivity
nested_items.description: Specifies whether or not the graph can be reachable over the internet. All access to graphs is IAM authenticated.

nested_items.name: vectorSearchConfiguration
nested_items.description: The vector-search configuration for the graph, which specifies the vector dimension to use in the vector index, if any.

nested_items.name: replicaCount
nested_items.description: The number of replicas in other AZs.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyIdentifier
nested_items.description: Specifies the KMS key used to encrypt data in the new graph.

nested_items.name: sourceSnapshotId
nested_items.description: The ID of the source graph.

nested_items.name: deletionProtection
nested_items.description: A value that indicates whether the graph has deletion protection enabled. The graph can't be deleted when deletion protection is enabled.

nested_items.name: buildNumber
nested_items.description: The build number of the graph software.
